title: Cardinality Analysis in Discovery
description:
Add cardinality analysis to metric discovery:

1. nthlayer analyze command for cardinality report
2. Warn on high-cardinality metrics (>1000 series)
3. PromQL queries for top cardinality offenders
4. Generate cardinality dashboard panels
5. Integration with trellis-discovery-enhance

Effort: 1 week
Priority: P2
